text.front:
BEFORE THE
MADURAI BENCH OF MADRAS HIGH COURT
DATED :
14.02.2020
CORAM
THE
HONOURABLE MRS. JUSTICE T.KRISHNAVALLI
W.P.(MD)No.2997 of 2020
P.Rajakumar
... Petitioner
Vs.
1.
The Superintendent of Police,
Theni District, Theni.
2.
The Deputy Superintendent of Police,
Uthamapalayam, Theni District.
3.
The Inspector of Police
,
Uthamapalayam Circle,
Odaipatti Police Station,
Uthamapalayam Taluk,
Theni District.
4.
The Sub-Inspector of Police
,
Odaipatti Police Station,
Uthamapalayam Taluk,
Theni District.
...Respondents
Prayer : Writ Petition filed under Article 226 of the Constitution of
India to issue a Writ of Mandamus, directing the respondents to
grant permission and necessary protection to perform the cultural
programmes viz., Karakattam, Raja Rani Attam and Adal Padal on
the eve of Arulmigu Kaliamman Kovil Temple Festival at Odaipatti
Village, Uthamapalayam Taluk, Theni District which is to be held
from 21.02.2020 to 23.02.2020.
For Petitioner :
Mr.A.Karthik
For Respondents :
Mr.S.Chandarasekar
Additional Public Prosecutor To
1.
The Superintendent of Police
,
Theni District, Theni.
2.
The Deputy Superintendent of Police
,
Uthamapalayam, Theni District.
3.
The Inspector of Police
,
Uthamapalayam Circle,
Odaipatti Police Station,
Uthamapalayam Taluk,
Theni District.
4.
The Sub-Inspector of Police
,
Odaipatti Police Station,
Uthamapalayam Taluk,
Theni District.
